biotools.summary: SPEAR is an annotation tool for SARS-CoV-2 genomes, it provides comprehensive annotation of all protein products, in particular, Spike (S) mutations are annotated with a range of scores that provide indications of their likely effects on ACE2 binding, and likely contribution to immune escape.

bioschemas.name: SPEAR
